meta.description: Christian Scientists are diligently working toward the same goals in light of the pandemic as everyone else in the community: health and protection.

title: Responses to the press on vaccination / Christian Science Sentinel
cleaned_text: It shall be the duty of the Committee on Publication to correct in a Christian manner impositions on the public in regard to Christian Science, injustices done Mrs. Eddy or members of this Church by the daily press, by periodicals or circulated literature of any sort.

opengraph.title: Responses to the press on vaccination / Christian Science Sentinel
opengraph.description: Christian Scientists are diligently working toward the same goals in light of the pandemic as everyone else in the community: health and protection.
